item.description:
This private event is for our class and practice members only.

This Thursday's Practice Session will move to this Park on June 17th.

This will be our "Finally It's Summer" Set open to all steppers that regularly attend The Den practice sessions only. (There will be no formal instruction tonight, just practice & open dance)

The venue is outdoors, open gazebo with covered top. Dress appropriately for weather conditions, it will occur rain or shine. Wear your Steppers of Boston shirts and gear. The dance floor is polished stone, comfy shoes are a must. Bring your lawn chair and snacks if you like.

This is a closed event for members only**. The general public is not invited, nor will it be publicized to the general public. We may draw a few spectators, of those folks that just happen to be walking by at the time. Membership to our club has it's privileges.

** Only Meetup members can see this location **

Please RSVP... we need an accurate headcount. PLEASE BRING THE LARGEST/BRIGHTEST FLASHLIGHT YOU HAVE WITH FRESH BATTERIES. THE SUN MAY SET BEFORE WE ARE DONE. THIS WILL BE A BLAST STEPPIN' WITH A BUNCH OF FLASH LIGHTS AIMED AT THE FLOOR.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me wearing my Stepper's shirt & listen for the steppin' tunes

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin' on Common Ground 6/17/10 - 6pm - Private Class & Practice
